values.name: ALL_MESSAGES
values.description: members will receive notifications for all messages by default

values.name: ONLY_MENTIONS
values.description: members will receive notifications only for messages that @mention them by default

values.name: DISABLED
values.description: media content will not be scanned

values.name: MEMBERS_WITHOUT_ROLES
values.description: media content sent by members without roles will be scanned

values.name: ALL_MEMBERS
values.description: media content sent by all members will be scanned

values.name: NONE
values.description: guild has no MFA/2FA requirement for moderation actions

values.name: ELEVATED
values.description: guild has a 2FA requirement for moderation actions

values.name: NONE
values.description: unrestricted

values.name: LOW
values.description: must have verified email on account

values.name: MEDIUM
values.description: must be registered on Discord for longer than 5 minutes

values.name: HIGH
values.description: must be a member of the server for longer than 10 minutes

values.name: VERY_HIGH
values.description: must have a verified phone number

values.name: NONE
values.description: guild has not unlocked any Server Boost perks

values.name: TIER_1
values.description: guild has unlocked Server Boost level 1 perks

values.name: TIER_2
values.description: guild has unlocked Server Boost level 2 perks

values.name: TIER_3
values.description: guild has unlocked Server Boost level 3 perks

values.name: SUPPRESS_JOIN_NOTIFICATIONS
values.description: Suppress member join notifications

values.name: SUPPRESS_PREMIUM_SUBSCRIPTIONS
values.description: Suppress server boost notifications

values.name: SUPPRESS_GUILD_REMINDER_NOTIFICATIONS
values.description: Suppress server setup tips

values.name: SUPPRESS_JOIN_NOTIFICATION_REPLIES
values.description: Hide member join sticker reply buttons

values.name: ANIMATED_ICON
values.description: guild has access to set an animated guild icon

values.name: BANNER
values.description: guild has access to set a guild banner image

values.name: COMMERCE
values.description: guild has access to use commerce features (i.e. create store channels)

values.name: COMMUNITY
values.description: guild can enable welcome screen, Membership Screening, stage channels and discovery, and receives community updates

values.name: DISCOVERABLE
values.description: guild is able to be discovered in the directory

values.name: FEATURABLE
values.description: guild is able to be featured in the directory

values.name: INVITE_SPLASH
values.description: guild has access to set an invite splash background

values.name: MEMBER_VERIFICATION_GATE_ENABLED
values.description: guild has enabled [Membership Screening](#DOCS_RESOURCES_GUILD/membership-screening-object)

values.name: MONETIZATION_ENABLED
values.description: guild has enabled monetization

values.name: MORE_STICKERS
values.description: guild has increased custom sticker slots

values.name: NEWS
values.description: guild has access to create news channels

values.name: PARTNERED
values.description: guild is partnered

values.name: PREVIEW_ENABLED
values.description: guild can be previewed before joining via Membership Screening or the directory

values.name: PRIVATE_THREADS
values.description: guild has access to create private threads

values.name: ROLE_ICONS
values.description: guild is able to set role icons

values.name: SEVEN_DAY_THREAD_ARCHIVE
values.description: guild has access to the seven day archive time for threads

values.name: THREE_DAY_THREAD_ARCHIVE
values.description: guild has access to the three day archive time for threads

values.name: TICKETED_EVENTS_ENABLED
values.description: guild has enabled ticketed events

values.name: VANITY_URL
values.description: guild has access to set a vanity URL

values.name: VERIFIED
values.description: guild is verified

values.name: VIP_REGIONS
values.description: guild has access to set 384kbps bitrate in voice (previously VIP voice servers)

values.name: WELCOME_SCREEN_ENABLED
values.description: guild has enabled the welcome screen
